trends: There have been no other sightings in Reading
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: 3 white lights moving incredibly fast from right to left with no sound
divs: Sighting DetailsI was letting my dog out around 11:38 P.M. when I noticed 3 bright lights tracking from right to left across the sky. The three lights seemed to be in a triangular formation and were moving incredibly fast with no sound; no jet engines, no props, no rotors. The object had no running lights, only 3 constant white lights, and was certainly flying well below the cloud ceiling. I would estimate the flying height of the object to be 4,000 to 5,000 feet up. The object moved across my field of view, across the top of the treeline from right to left, in about 6-7 seconds.
